alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:53PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Cheyenne, northeastern Kimball, southwestern Morrill and eastern Banner Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 553 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Court House And Jail Rocks to 6 miles north of Potter. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Bayard, Northport, Chimney Rock State Park, Court House And Jail Rocks, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Redington, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And L62 and South Bayard Junction. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
